tpk::RotaryAxis

tpk::RotaryAxis Class Reference

#include <RotaryAxis.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Rotary axis.

A Rotary Axis object converts a position demand in radians to a position of a rotary axis in "user" units (such as degrees) with logic for choosing the correct overlap region and remaining within specified motion limits.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum tpk::RotaryAxis::wraplogic

Wrap logic options.

Enumerator:
lowRange  Go to low overlap region.
highRange  Go to high overlap region.
nearestRange  Go to nearest accessible position.
limit  Stay in limit.

enum tpk::RotaryAxis::wrapref

Reference position for wrap calculation.

Enumerator:
lastDemand  Go to position closest to previous demand.
currentPosition  Go to position closest to current position.

enum tpk::RotaryAxis::postype

Position type.

Enumerator:
demand  Demanded position.
achieved  achieved position

enum tpk::RotaryAxis::units

Units.

Enumerator:
radians  radians
axis  axis units

Trajectory tpk::RotaryAxis::track ( double  t,
const Trajectory &  demandPos 
)

Get new axis position.

The wrap control settings default to nearest range and last demand which are suitable for axes with no overlap region.

Returns:
Axis position for new demand orientation (axis units)
Parameters:
t  time (MJD, TAI)
